title: How to get rid of Evil Eye: Ruqya - Assim al hakeem
transcript: what happens if I don't know the individual in this case one is supposed to decide the proper rukia al-fatihah ayatul kursi the last two ayahs of Surat al-baqarah and the last three holes Aleph las al-falaq and and Nass and he can wipe all of his body by cupping his hand and reciting in it and blowing and wiping his body multiple times he can recite it over a glass or a cup of Zamzam water or normal water multiple times and drink it throughout the day and the night and inshallah within a few days he will be cured with the grace of allah azzawajal
